VARIABLES.name: y_{AB}
VARIABLES.description: Whether there is a link between A and B

VARIABLES.name: y_{AC}
VARIABLES.description: Whether there is a link between A and C

VARIABLES.name: y_{AE}
VARIABLES.description: Whether there is a link between A and E

VARIABLES.name: y_{BC}
VARIABLES.description: Whether there is a link between B and C

VARIABLES.name: y_{BD}
VARIABLES.description: Whether there is a link between B and D

VARIABLES.name: y_{CD}
VARIABLES.description: Whether there is a link between C and D

VARIABLES.name: y_{CE}
VARIABLES.description: Whether there is a link between C and E

VARIABLES.name: y_{DE}
VARIABLES.description: Whether there is a link between D and E

VARIABLES.name: x_{AB}
VARIABLES.description: Bandwidth of the link between A and B

VARIABLES.name: x_{AC}
VARIABLES.description: Bandwidth of the link between A and C

VARIABLES.name: x_{AE}
VARIABLES.description: Bandwidth of the link between A and E

VARIABLES.name: x_{BC}
VARIABLES.description: Bandwidth of the link between B and C

VARIABLES.name: x_{BD}
VARIABLES.description: Bandwidth of the link between B and D

VARIABLES.name: x_{CD}
VARIABLES.description: Bandwidth of the link between C and D

VARIABLES.name: x_{CE}
VARIABLES.description: Bandwidth of the link between C and E

VARIABLES.name: x_{DE}
VARIABLES.description: Bandwidth of the link between D and E

OBJECTIVE.query: The specific part of extracted_queries used for objective

CONSTRAINTS.query: y_{AB} + y_{AC} + y_{AE} - y_{BC} - y_{BD} - y_{CD} - y_{CE} - y_{DE} >= 1
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: y_{AB} + y_{AC} + y_{AE} - y_{BC} - y_{BD} - y_{CD} - y_{CE} - y_{DE} \ge 1
CONSTRAINTS.description: Establish a link between node A and node E that must pass through service node C (without loops)
If the direct link between A and E is selected, the transmission efficiency of the path decreases by 10% due to the long distance between the two nodes.

CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{AB} + x_{AC} + x_{BC} + x_{BD} + x_{CD} + x_{DE} \ge 100
CONSTRAINTS.description: The sum of bandwidth is at least 100.
